name: Inclement
description: In this farm-building strategy game set in the harsh environment of Northern Europe, you manage your land from clearing forests and selling grain at the neighbouring town to building barns and eventually oil rigs. Your right decisions will allow you to develop, and eventually grow your wealth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, or 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz or faster processor Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8, or 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 50 MB available space
